title: mp223 Applied Econometric Methods for the Social Sciences (SoSe 2022)
text: This is the website where most lectures, R application exercises and supplementary materials are developed for the course MP223 Applied Econometric Methods for the Social Sciences (SoSe 2022). it is not a substitute of course Ilias or course StudIP pages, but rather a convenient way of making the slides accessible, downloadable and nice.

title: Introduction. Organisation. Setup.
text:
Course structure and overview (1/4)
MP223 - Applied Econometrics Methods for the Social Sciences is taught in presence.


Every Wednesday 14:00 - 18:00, Room: Senckenbergstr. 03, 216 (Ze-PC2)
Wear a mask all the time.
Get a new mask from a lecturer for every lecture.
Optional, make a COVID-19 speed tests if you do no feel well (ask the test from a lecturer).
Please, do not show up if you are sick.

title: Introduction. Organisation. Setup.
Introduction. Organisation. Setup.
Introduction. Organisation. Setup.
text:
Course structure and overview (4/4)
Examination:

60% written exam



40% practical homework on R analysis.

Will be disseminated on the week 4-6.
Deadline: end of semester.

title: Week 1

title: Week 1
text:
To do before the Week 3
